house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1996 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 6938 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Fenced, Foyer, Outdoor Lights, Pantry, Roman Tub, SmokeDetector, Trash Compacter
